Ovarian cancer: Tauranga mother raising funds unfunded drug Avastin https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/ovarian-cancer-tauranga-mother-raise-funds-unfunded-drug-avastin/D7LSK5B26BGCFCMBDDL2ZO4RBU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/ovarian-cancer-tauranga-mother-raise-funds-unfunded-drug-avastin/D7LSK5B26BGCFCMBDDL2ZO4RBU/ Megan Wilson'This is the end of the road unless I get Avastin.' Sat, 09 Dec 2023 21:00:32 +0000 Tauranga mother Shirley Ryder was diagnosed with terminal ovarian cancer in 2017 and is raising money for Avastin - an unfunded, life-prolonging drug - so she can spend more time with her children. Photo / Alex Cairns
